alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80 (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 08 at 4:58PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...AN AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT SOUTH CENTRAL WEBER...SALT LAKE...EASTERN DAVIS...SOUTHWESTERN MORGAN AND EAST CENTRAL TOOELE COUNTIES... At 457 PM MST...an area of heavy snow was along a line extending from Syracuse to near Magna to Tooele...and moving east at 30 mph. Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, West Valley City, Sandy, Ogden, Layton, Murray, Bountiful, Tooele, Farmington, Morgan, Hill Air Force Base, West Jordan, Taylorsville, South Jordan, Draper, Riverton, Roy, Cottonwood Heights, Clearfield and Midvale. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 288 and 338. Interstate 84 between mile markers 84 and 104. Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 103 and 133. * winds in excess of 25 mph are possible with this area of heavy snow. * visibilities will drop quickly to less than a half mile in this area of heavy snow. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
